akn:section.akn:heading: Awards for demonstration programs by local partnerships to coerce abstinence in chronic hard-drug us

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Awards required The Director shall make competitive awards to fund demonstration programs by eligible partnerships for the purpose of reducing the use of illicit drugs by chronic hard-drug users living in the community while under the supervision of the criminal justice system.
